00027 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00028 #ifndef __USERTYPEDEF_H
00029 #define __USERTYPEDEF_H
00030 
00031 /* Exported typedef ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00032 typedef struct
00033 {
00034   u8  L;
00035   u8  H;
00036 } wformat_u8;
00037 
00038 typedef struct
00039 {
00040   u16 L;
00041   u16 H;
00042 } dwformat_u16;
00043 
00044 typedef union
00045 {
00046   wformat_u8          _u8;
00047   u16                 _u16;
00048   u8                  arr[2];
00049 } wformat_uWord;
00050 
00051 typedef union
00052 {
00053   dwformat_u16        _u16;
00054   u32                 _u32;
00055   u8                  arr[4];
00056 } dwformat_uWord;
00057 
00058 typedef union
00059 {
00060   s32                 _s32;
00061   s8                  arr[4];
00062 } sdwformat_uWord;
00063 
00064 /* Exported macro ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00065 #define LONIBBLE(val)   (val & 0x0f)
00066 #define HINIBBLE(val)   (val & 0xf0)>>4
00067 #define LOBYTE(val)     (val & 0x00ff)
00068 #define HIBYTE(val)     (val & 0xff00)>>8
00069 #define DWBYTE0(val)    (val & 0x000000ff)
00070 #define DWBYTE1(val)    (val & 0x0000ff00)>>8
00071 #define DWBYTE2(val)    (val & 0x00ff0000)>>16
00072 #define DWBYTE3(val)    (val & 0xff000000)>>24
00073 #define LOINT(val)      (val & 0x0000ffff)
00074 #define HIINT(val)      (val & 0xffff0000)>>16
00075 
00076 #endif /* __USERTYPEDEF_H -------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
